Grouped_Utterances: I think I want to focus on building more social connections. I’ve been isolating a bit.

I’ve been well! I had that conversation with my wife, and it went better than I expected. We talked openly about our feelings and what we both need. It felt good to finally communicate. We agreed to check in with each other more often and to set aside time for date nights. It felt really liberating. I was nervous at first, but she was receptive and understanding.
Not too many. I had a moment of temptation to gamble, but I reminded myself of the progress I’ve made.
I’m still going to the gym regularly and walking three days a week. I feel stronger and more energetic. Yes, I think I’m feeling more positive overall. Exercise really helps clear my mind.

Yes, we went out for dinner last weekend. It was nice to reconnect. It was great! We talked and laughed like we used to, and it reminded me of how much I care about her. Yes, I’ve been consistent. It’s become a part of my daily routine. I talked to a friend about it and they helped me refocus on my goals. It felt good to reach out.

I’m considering joining a local club or group that aligns with my interests. I’m thinking about a hiking group or maybe something related to gardening. Yes, I think I’ll look into it. I want to expand my social circle. That sounds perfect! I’ll aim to find a group to join by our next session.
